did.abstract: H. Randolph Lever papers, dated 1963. The papers consist of Lever's last will and testament, as well as a newspaper clipping announcing the marriage of John Howard Lever to Mary Eliza Backus. H. Randolph Lever was a wealthy resident of Brooklyn who bequeathed multiple items from his estate to the Brooklyn Institute of Arts and Sciences, and the Long Island Historical Society (later the Brooklyn Historical Society).
